questiontext.text: Using your knowledge of the cosine function and the results of the  previous  Task sketch the graph of \(x\) against \(t\) where \[ \quad x=R\cos \omega t   \text{ for } t=0 \text{ to } t=\dfrac{4\pi}{\omega}\]

generalfeedback.text: This graph shows part of a cosine wave, specifically two periods of oscillation.  The shape of the graph suggests that the term wave is indeed an appropriate description.
